W6HpE1rhs7w.title: Google CEO: AI impact to be more profound than discovery of fire, electricity | 60 Minutes
W6HpE1rhs7w.author: 60 Minutes
W6HpE1rhs7w.description:
Sundar Pichai told 60 Minutes he believes artificial intelligence technology will be more capable than anything humankind has seen before.

#60minutes #google #artificialintelligence 

"60 Minutes" is the most successful television broadcast in history. Offering hard-hitting investigative reports, interviews, feature segments and profiles of people in the news, the broadcast began in 1968 and is still a hit, over 50 seasons later, regularly making Nielsen's Top 10.
